about_the_game:
🏜️ Sands of Supremacy is a single-player, side-scrolling strategy/resource management hybrid 2D game set in a futuristic desert landscape on an unknown planet. Developed by Divinus Games, the game combines survival, strategy, and resource management elements to create a challenging and immersive gameplay experience.



☠️ In Sands of Supremacy, your primary objective is to survive for days, managing resources and defending your base against relentless waves of enemies. The game’s dynamic day/night cycle adds an extra layer of strategy. During the day, visibility is optimal, and you can focus on gathering resources and preparing your base. At night, enemy activity increases, requiring a robust defense strategy to survive the onslaught.



⚙️ As the leader, you must control various characters with unique abilities. Each character brings specific strengths and bonuses against certain enemy types. You’ll manage resources like alloy and energy, crucial for constructing and upgrading buildings, and recruiting different types of droids to assist in your defense. Buildings include the Town Center, which is the heart of your operations, various recruiter buildings for different droid units, and defensive walls that can be upgraded to enhance your defenses.



⚖️ Prepare to dive into the unforgiving world of Sands of Supremacy, where every decision matters, and every day brings new challenges. As you uncover the secrets of a once-great civilization buried beneath the sands, you’ll need to leverage your strategic prowess and resourcefulness to protect your base and ensure the survival of your people. With its compelling blend of strategy, resource management, and survival elements, Sands of Supremacy promises an engaging and intense gameplay experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Are you ready to lead your people to supremacy in the harshest of environments? The sands await your command!
